language.name: English
cyan.message.disabled.bed: The /bed command is disabled. To enable it, enter '/setAllowBed true' in chat
cyan.message.disabled.kgi: The /kgi command is disabled. To enable it, enter '/setAllowKgi true' in chat
cyan.message.disabled.surface:
The /surface command is disabled.
 To enable it, enter '/setAllowSurface true' in chat
cyan.message.bed: §6You have been teleported to your bed
cyan.message.respawnanchor: §6You have been teleported to your respawn anchor
cyan.message.bed.notfound: §cYou don't have an attributed bed or respawn anchor
cyan.message.surface: §6You have been teleported to the surface
cyan.message.kgir: §cGround items have been removed in a radius of §c%d §cchunks
cyan.message.help.2: | - /bed : teleports the player to its bed or respawn anchor
cyan.message.help.3: | - /surface : teleports the player to the surface
cyan.message.help.5: | - /ops : displays a list with the name of all op players
cyan.message.mods:
The mods installed on this server are :
%s
cyan.message.notOp: §cYou don't have the required permission to do that
cyan.message.playerNotFound: §cPlayer not found. The player must be online
cyan.message.incorrectIntOp: The OP level must be [0;1;2;3 or 4]

cyan.message.setAllowSurface: AllowSurface option have been set to %s

cyan.message.setRequiredOpLevelKgi: RequiredOpLevelKgi option have been set to %d
